name: Genkai-E Demo
description:
Corrector inglés de ortografía y de gramática  inglés This is a basic demonstration of Genkai-Engine functions, and preview of "Go To Zero Project".

Please not judge the future project about the actual state of Engine.

All suggestions are welcomed.

Actual Version: 0.1.4(Aqua Currency)

Version 0.1.4:

  • In this version are 4 modes of game, 1 is hide of selection menu.
  • Text Adventure is not implemented.
  • Currently is not avalaible save the project.
  • Currently is not avalaible change the game mode when is selected.
  • Campaign is not avalaible, and  I not go to spoil.
  • UI are not totally implemented.
  • Death System are not implemented.
  • UI only work in english.
